description: Treated as accepted, but doubtful whether this is correct.
name: provisionally accepted

description: Names which point unambiguously at one species (not specifying whether homo- or heterotypic).Synonyms, in the CoL sense, include also orthographic variants and published misspellings.
name: synonym

description: Names which are ambiguous because they point at the current species and one or more others e.g. homonyms, pro-parte synonyms (in other words, names which appear more than in one place in the Catalogue).
name: ambiguous synonym

description: A misapplied name. Usually accompanied with an accordingTo on the synonym to indicate the source the misapplication can be found in.
name: misapplied

description: A name alone without any usage, neither a synonym nor a taxon.
name: bare name
